com.marginallyclever.robotoverlord.makelangeloRobot.settings

Class MakelangeloRobotSettings

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.marginallyclever.robotoverlord.makelangeloRobot.settings.MakelangeloRobotSettings

  • public final class MakelangeloRobotSettings
extends Object
    TODO move tool names into translations and add a color palette system for quantizing colors All the hardware settings for a single Makelangelo robot.
    Author:
    Dan Royer

      • getAvailableConfigurations

        public String[] getAvailableConfigurations()
        Get the UID of every machine this computer recognizes INCLUDING machine 0, which is only assigned temporarily when a machine is new or before the first software connect.
        Returns:
        an array of strings, each string is a machine UID.
